duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform forklift driver-related duties as directed, including wrapping loads with shrink wrap and loading/unloading trucks.
Responsible for daily inspection of forklift equipment, maintenance, and compliance with safety standards.
Maintain operating supplies to optimize production and make minor adjustments to equipment and supplies as needed.
Maintain a clean and organized work area and equipment, advise supervisors of concerns/issues.
Assist with training of new employees and perform other tasks related to production and bottling as requested.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma, GED certificate preferred
